EmailTemplate.name: 11_18_2014 turboticker November.ticker_use
EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo 5.0 Webcast | Win a Phantom 2 Vision+ Drone | turboticker November 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/5_0-release-webinar/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickernov&utm_content=111814> Biggest Release Since Founding VMTurbo 5.0 marks the biggest release since the founding of VMTurbo in 2009. This latest version, released November 12, features five new Control Modules, extending VMTurbo-owners' control to Network, Hybrid Cloud, VDI, Applications, and Containers.
As a celebration of this release, VMTurbo is giving away a Phantom 2 Vision+ Drone every month until February to all who take VMTurbo 5.0 for a 30-Day test drive <http://vmturbo.com/35000-decisions?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickernov&utm_content=111814>. Video: How VMTurbo 5.0 Works <http://vmturbo.com/product?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickernov&utm_content=111814>
"Minimal configuration, no workflow scripting, no alerts. It just works, right out of the box." How does VMTurbo's decision engine drive environments to their healthiest state, right from the beginning? Watch this 3-minute video to learn how VMTurbo does it. Whitepaper: Network Flow & Application Performance <http://vmturbo.com/network-flow-and-application-performance?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickernov&utm_content=111814>
n-Tier application architecture offers many undeniable benefits. However, the proliferation of this architecture - enabled by virtualization - has yielded a boom in East-West network traffic. Learn how to minimize the latency created by this phenomenon and more in this brand new whitepaper. Blog: Software-Defined Latency <http://vmturbo.com/blog/bane-software-defined-universe-software-defined-latency?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickernov&utm_content=111814>
As the world continues its pivot from hardware definition to software definition, the bane of the SDDC - Latency - rears its ugly head. How do we slay latency? www.vmturbo.com 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
contacts <http://go.vmturbo.com/contact-us.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | website <http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | privacy policy <http://www.vmturbo.com/privacy-policy?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | forward <{{system.forwardToFriendLink:default=edit%20me}}>
